selected_quotes: 1st peer reviewed paper on role of Google Glass in medicine #ehealth #wearabletech
#GoogleGlass Study: Potential but needs hardware improvements, data protection, special medical apps
Google Glass in pediatric surgery: An exploratory
The first ever systematic examination of Google Glass in the healthcare environment

citation.abstract: Personal portable information technology is advancing at a breathtaking speed. Google has recently introduced Glass, a device that is worn like conventional glasses, but that combines a computerized central processing unit, touchpad, display screen, high-definition camera, microphone, bone-conduction transducer, and wireless connectivity. We have obtained a Glass device through Google's Explorer program and have tested its applicability in our daily pediatric surgical practice and in relevant experimental settings.
citation.title: Google Glass in pediatric surgery: An exploratory study.
